channel.title: Pretty weird game bug
channel.description: I was possessor and when I jumped I got killed by the DK and got healed but still died. When I was dead, everyone who was alive could still read my chat and the dead couldn't. It also displayed my abilities during the day. Screenshots: https://i.gyazo.com/a9a51ff89a877a95ab9d5dc412dc4d0c.png https://i.gyazo.com/d63d8daea634c0f9a496abfb75cd8f17.jpg
